titleStmt.title: A remonstrance presented to His Maiestie by the Parliament in June, ann. dom. 1628, 3 ̊Caroli Regis vvherein is discovered the great danger that England and Ireland lay under, and the Parliaments care to have secured them : as also the names of some of the enemies of the state, as Dr. Laud, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Another issue has imprint: London : Printed by T. P. and M. S. for John Owen, Septemb. 2. 1642.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
